General.Name: Jereissati Participações S.A.
General.Description: Iguatemi S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates shopping centers in Brazil. It designs, plans, develops, and manages shopping malls, outlets, and mixed-use real estate complexes, as well as office towers. The company operates a network of 14 shopping centers, 2 outlet stores, and 3 office towers with a total gross leased area of approximately 711,000 square meters. In addition, it provides economic, financial, tax advisory, and consulting services. The company was formerly known as Jereissati Participações S.A. and changed its name to Iguatemi S.A. in November 2021. The company was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Angelina Maffei Vita, 200, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 01455-070
